price: 144. Mbele alingaki kotikala okati ya libumu lia ye (mbisi) kino o mokolo mwa lisekwa.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
